ygData.subject: EQ Exploit
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail! And welcome to the 2nd edition of ... This weeks exploit is brought to you by: Angry Shamans Across Norrath (ASAN). Quit fucking nerfing our characters.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail! And welcome to the 2nd edition of

---===Exploit of The Week===---

This weeks exploit is brought to you by: Angry Shamans Across Norrath
(ASAN). Quit fucking nerfing our characters.

Last week Angry Shamans brought you a way to trade no-drop items. We
hope some people were able to benefit from this. This week Shamans had
their Pets Nerfed. Our dogs were already ten levels below us (at
best), and were never in any way better than a warrior or monk of equal
level. Verant didn't bother to mention our pets in any update, just
Magician's and Necro's pets.

This week's exploit is mostly for people on PvP servers, but can also
be handy for you carebears in a duel.

Recently Verant made a patch which made it impossible for someone to
loot from Melee or Range slots when they are killed by a PC. I have
discovered a way around this.

Alright, before you go on your killing spree tonight, fill up all your
general inventory slots, including backpacks. Something cheap will do
just fine (bait, milk, muffins) just make sure all inventory slots are
full. Now find a poor helpless warrior with a big, shiny weapon or
shield. Kill him. When looting his corpse RIGHT CLICK on his weapon.
You should get a message saying "You have no more room and item falls
to the ground". Look down and his weapon will be sitting there, ready
for you to pick up.


Heheh! And you melee classes thought pets were unfair ;)

Enjoy!
